name: Empty Desert (Wagon Road)
description: A quiet stretch of dusty wagon road, where the only sound is the distant, mournful howl of a coyote. The path here is faint, a mere suggestion of passage across the vast, indifferent desert. Otherwise, it is quiet, a stillness that borders on oppressive, broken only by the relentless heat. The wagon road continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a testament to the vast, undeveloped frontier. The air is thick with dust and the scent of dry sagebrush, broken only by the distant cry of a hawk, oblivious to the subtle grit of the west.
